title: IKodi
description: IKodi is my personal blog, where I share my knowledge writing posts about different tools, technologies and concepts related to the world of web development. With comment system included!

title: Clippitt
description: 2nd place winner in the CloudCreate Hackathon 2023. Simple: Upload a Twitch clip, select the desired areas, choose a layout, and automatically get a vertical video for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, and Instagram reels.

title: wc-notify
description: wc-notify is an npm package to show simple and customizable toast notifications. It's built on top of the Web Components standard, so it is available on all frameworks. It allows you to customize the duration, theme, animation, and much more.

title: Kings League Project
description: API and website of the Kings League made for educational purposes. Open-source. Web scrapping, GitHub Actions and testing. I've collaborated in the UI and writing documentation.

title: Animated Weather
description: Create a video of the weather status anywhere in the world. Customize music, colors, and then download it to share with others.

title: Quick Papper
description: An AI-powered application to generate blog drafts from just a title. You can summarize, extend or regenerate each slice of the blog, and then export it in HTML, Markdown or plain text. Part of midudev-cohere hackathon.

title: Minecraft Clone
description: A fully functional Minecraft clone, based on the freeCodeCamp tutorial, using Three.js (a 2D/3D JavaScript library), React and TypeScript.

title: Shape Snap
description: A generator of banners for social networks like Twitter, LinkedIn and Youtube. You upload only one image, and Shape Snap automatically crops it to the needed size for each platform.

title: Full-stack ToDo
description: The typical To-Do application, but integrating both client and server sides, with users authentication and data persistence with MongoDB.

title: tic-tac-toe
description: In this version of the well-known Tic-Tac-Toe, you can play versus the machine, store your points locally to play later, change players colors and some other funny features.

title: Connect Four
description: My version of the "Connect Four" game, implementing OOP with TypeScript and separating logic from view.

title: Crypto Assets
description: A simple dashboard to view your crypto address's transactions, with a minimalist design based on Material Design style guidelines.

title: Password Generator
description: A custom and secure password generator. The combination of numbers, symbols, and upper, lower and mixed case result in a wide variety of combinations. Made with vanilla JS.
